snippet: The company, the third-largest airline in the United States, predicted a record quarter when it next reports financial results, in October.
abstract: Delta Air Lines reports second-quarter profit nearly doubled to $1.5 bilion; revenue rose 1 percent to $10.71 billion.
lead_paragraph: The company, the third-largest airline in the United States, predicted a record quarter when it next reports financial results, in October.

headline.print_headline: Despite Weak Growth, Delta Profit Is Up Strongly
headline.main: Despite Weak Growth, Delta Profit Is Way Up
